description: This file implements a client function `sendContactMessage` to send contact form data to a Django backend API. It handles environment configuration, constructs the API request, processes the response, and manages errors.

methods.name: sendContactMessage({ name, email, subject, message })
methods.description: Asynchronously sends contact form data to the specified API endpoint, handling response parsing and error management.

ctags.name: sendContactMessage
ctags.pattern: /^export async function sendContactMessage({ name, email, subject, message }) {$/
